text:
The anyType type declaration works only within <complexContent>
but not as a simpleType. F.e. the example given in XMLSchema-0, 2.5.4
does not work with xerces.

<xsd:element name="anything" type="xsd:anyType"/>

[Error] b.xml:3:44: Schema error: type not found :
http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:anyType.

PS: anySimpleType doesn't work too.

Regards Joerg Vogel, German Aerospace center
creator: joerg.vogel@dlr.de
sandygao@ca.ibm.com
text: Fixed in CVS. Now we support both types.
